events.name: Skype for Business UG â€“ June 2015 meet up
events.description: We have Skype for Business MVP Thamara Wijesinghe, working for Empired Ltd as a Senior Infrastructure Consultant. He is visiting Singapore next week and has agreed to present at Singapore User Group Event. He has a versatile skill set with experience in Unified Communications solutions, TDM and IP based platforms. He will be presenting the following topic: Moving from Legacy PBXs to Skype for Business and Best practices\ recommendations for a smooth migration Also since we will have the Lync Room System room, we can walk thru the LRS system for those who have not got their hands on one. Venue: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard Level 22 , Meeting Room - ROOM 22BR-01, Singapore 6:30pm to 7:15 is food and refreshments and networking. 7:15pm to 8:15pm - 1st session from Thamara Wijesinghe 8:15 to 8:30pm - drinks and break. 8:30pm to 9:30pm - LRS introduction and demo.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room
